title: Searching for a font for the word "STORM"
content:
Hi,  
i am searching for a font which is distinctive for the word STORM and is sans serif. Any recommandations?
author: bog1

comments.content:
“Distinctive” is a bit vague. Do you want the typography to evoke an actual storm? Perhaps one of these might work:  
 [http://www.blambot.com/fonts\_sfx.shtml](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317180618/http:/www.blambot.com/fonts_sfx.shtml "http://www.blambot.com/fonts\_sfx.shtml")  
 [http://www.blambot.com/fonts\_design\_horror.shtml](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317180618/http:/www.blambot.com/fonts_design_horror.shtml "http://www.blambot.com/fonts\_design\_horror.shtml")
Hi, thanks for replies. Ok, distinctive is really a bit vogue. I thought about something bold, strong, powerful, ...

"I thought about something bold, strong, powerful, ..."

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317180618im_/http:/typophile.com/files/HurricaneBrendelAsStorm_5192.jpg)
  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/spotlight/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317180618/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/spotlight/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/spotlight/")  
Brendel ripped the font and called it Hurricane.  
This has serifs but it works for me as saying big, powerful storm.  
Don
If by STORM you're thinking of something wild and destructive and unpredictable, you might try mixing different fonts or styles or weights together.

"If by STORM you're thinking of something wild and destructive," I believe this is well expressed in Martyric

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317180618im_/http:/typophile.com/files/MartyricAsStorm_4800.gif)
  [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/mawns/martyric/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317180618/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/mawns/martyric/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/mawns/martyric/")  
and North West 
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317180618im_/http:/typophile.com/files/NorthWestAsStorm_5859.gif)
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/william-johnston/north-west/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317180618/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/william-johnston/north-west/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/william-johnston/north-west/")  
Don

Ok, to give a direction:

i lookes the hole night for fonts and i think Ubunutu is really a nice one and i font additionally the font Avenir Next. Any other ideas in this directon?

thank and best regards  
Yavuz
